title: Ticket #2022: Remove all code implementing GLEXEC_STARTER knob
description: Setting GLEXEC_STARTER to True (which tells Condor to invoke glexec between the startd and starter) has not only been deprecated for years, it now appears to be broken - see #1993. This knob should be ripped from the code. All users should use GLEXEC_JOB=True instead as stated in the manual, which tells Condor to invoke glexec between the starter and the job.
creator: tannenba
